content.p:
ยง 27-1909. Market development.
 No later than one year after the effective date of this title and
continuing annually thereafter, the department of economic development
shall:
 1. assist private market development with new technologies for waste
tire reuse and recycling with an emphasis on higher-value end uses in
order to further create and enhance sustainable markets;
 2. provide industrial and consumer education on other benefits of
recycled waste tire product through the preparation of fact sheets and
public workshops; and
 3. prepare an annual summary report and analysis of markets and
disposition of both New York state stockpiled tires and New York state
annually generated waste tires. This report shall be submitted to the
department and legislature by the last day of March of each year.
